alert.note: Alert for Cass; Ransom; Richland; Sargent (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 28 at 1:50PM CST until January 29 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST SUNDAY... ...WIND CHILL WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM SUNDAY TO NOON CST MONDAY... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 45 below zero. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 40 below zero. * WHERE...Portions of central, north central, northwest and west central Minnesota and southeast North Dakota. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Warning, from 6 PM Sunday to noon CST Monday. For the Wind Chill Advisory, until 6 PM CST Sunday. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. If outside, make sure you wear appropriate winter clothing. Use caution while outside. Wear appropriate winter clothing.
